definition.name: NXcg_polyhedron

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: c
symbol.doc: The cardinality of the set, i.e. the number of polyhedra.

symbol.name: n_e_total
symbol.doc: The total number of edges for all polyhedra.

symbol.name: n_f_total
symbol.doc: The total number of faces for all polyhedra.

definition.doc:
Computational geometry description of a set of polyhedra in Euclidean space.
Polyhedra or so-called cells (especially in the convex of tessellations) are constructed from polygon meshes. Polyhedra may make contact to allow a usage of this base class for a description of tessellations.
For the description of more complicated manifolds and especially for polyhedra with holes, users are advised to check if their particular needs are described by creating customized instances of an :ref:`NXcg_polygon`.

field.name: number_of_faces
field.doc: The number of faces for each polyhedron. Faces of adjoining polyhedra are counted for each polyhedron.

field.name: number_of_edges
field.doc: The number of edges for each polyhedron. Edges of adjoining polyhedra are counted for each polyhedron.

group.name: polyhedra
group.doc: Combined storage of all primitives of all polyhedra.

group.name: polyhedron_half_edgeID
group.doc: Individual storage of each polygon as a graph.
